signature: static <U, T> BiFunctionStringLookup<U, T> on(final Map<String, T> map)
name: on
javadoc:
/**
     * Creates a new instance backed by a Map. Used by the default lookup.
     *
     * @param <T> the map's value type.
     * @param map the map of keys to values, may be null.
     * @return a new instance backed by the given map.
     */

signature: public String lookup(final String key, final P object)
name: lookup
javadoc:
/** * Looks up a String key by applying the function. *

* If the function is null, then null is returned. The function result object is converted to a string using * toString(). *

* * @param key the key to be looked up, may be null. * @return The function result as a string, may be null. */
